open_risks: US flash PMIs deliver 'hot prices/firm activity' mix -> yields/real rates up -> NQ underperforms via duration channel
Greenland/tariff headline gap re-opens (weekend or off-hours), re-widening risk premia and supporting gold while pressuring ES/NQ
Earnings landmines broaden beyond Intel (AI/semis guidance, mega-cap read-through) causing index-level de-risking
Cross-asset adverse mix: equities soften while yields rise (tightening financial conditions) rather than the 'risk-off = yields down' cushion
Energy shock variant: persistent inventory builds -> oil down -> energy equities/credit underperform -> broader cyclicals sentiment drag
